plot: In 1977 in a small town in West Texas a New York artist faces off with his wife, escalating into a dispute that drags their kids into a tug of war and a turning point for the whole family.
title: Remember Back, Remember When
plot_es: In 1977 in a small town in West Texas a New York artist faces off with his wife, escalating into a dispute that drags their kids into a tug of war and a turning point for the whole family.
plot_en: In 1977 in a small town in West Texas a New York artist faces off with his wife, escalating into a dispute that drags their kids into a tug of war and a turning point for the whole family.
